issue.title: [R] [Docs] Remove our tabbing hack now that it's supported by pkgdown
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-14624](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14624). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
tabsets are now supported natively in pkgdown (with bootstrap 5)

https://github.com/r-lib/pkgdown/pull/1694

So we can pull out the hack we have to make that work for our dev docs vignette

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14624?focusedCommentId=17565775) by @toddfarmer:*
This issue was last updated over 90 days ago, which may be an indication it is no longer being actively worked. To better reflect the current state, the issue is being unassigned. Please feel free to re-take assignment of the issue if it is being actively worked, or if you plan to start that work soon.

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14624?focusedCommentId=17566385) by Jonathan Keane (jonkeane):*
This was fixed as part of the work to update the version switcher in the docs.
